jobDescription: Data is central to Twitch’s decision-making process. The Product Analyst program at Twitch is a critical component our data-driven decision- making. As an analyst in the program, you will be working closely on the ground floor with your team, crafting the way product performance is measured, defining what questions should be asked, and defining analytics methods and tools to support the growing business. The data analyst program is a rotation within Twitch that will give you deep grounding in our platforms and products. The program is designed to give you an edge to jump into [long-term], operating roles at Twitch including data science, product management, and technical program management.For this role, we are looking for a data analyst to join our Product Analyst program to support the VOD (Video-on-Demand) team in the Consumer Experience organization. The Consumer Experience organization’s mission is to enable Twitch creators to make a living entertaining and educating their fans. In a typical week or month, you will be responsible for data instrumentation, dashboard/report building, metrics reviews, and ad hoc analysis.Responsibilities
